job_description: DUTIES:The successful candidate will possess project planning skills, strong communication skills, excellent computer skills and a good understanding of equipment technologies, limitations, and their effect on safety, quality,productivity and cost.The position is responsible for assisting the AMC Team with the following:•Utilizing Reliability Centered Maintenance approach to develop inspection, predictive and preventive maintenance programs for assigned assets.•Preparing, monitoring and evaluating the results from equipment inspections.•Establishing equipment criticality and technical status.•Defining and optimizing spare part levels for assigned assets.•Developing plans for maintenance downturns, major plant shutdowns and maintenance related capital expenditure projects.•Effectively managing external resources assigned to specific maintenance activities.•Developing and coordinating maintenance budgets for assigned assets.•Representing maintenance on capital expenditure projects.•Managing small maintenance capital projects.•Managing technical documentation.•Monitoring and analyzing Key Performance Indicators and metrics for assigned assets.
